onset.Description: Time from the beginning of the scan when the event starts, in seconds

duration.Description: Length of the event in seconds

phase.Description: Experimental phase during which the trial occurred

trialtype.Description: Pair type (during study phase) or Test type (during test phase)

category.Description: Category of the linking (B) item in the pair presented on the trial

pairnum.Description: Identifier for the stimulus pair in the trial. This can be used to match trials from the same triad (ABC)

accuracy.Description: Indicator of whether the participant's response was correct. In the test phase, this corresponds to the accuracy of the response on each trial. In the study phase, this column indicates the back-sorted accuracy of the study phase trial, based on the accuracy of the corresponding indirect test trial

Levels.NA: No response (In the test phase, an NA indicates that the participant did not respond on a given trial. In the study phase, an NA indicates that the corresponding test phase trial did not receive a response.
